aiMessage.content: I understand you'd like to make changes to your resume. Please try rephrasing your request or be more specific about what you'd like to modify.

llmResponse.message: I understand you'd like to make changes to your resume. Please try rephrasing your request or be more specific about what you'd like to modify.
suggestions: Try: "Make my summary more specific to this role"
